summary: An email from a UMB Bank Judicial Compliance specialist regarding a response to a subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates legal process activity related to Maxwell's case in June 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email's subject and content are regarding a subpoena issued for her.

persons.name: Legal Process Specialist I
persons.context: The sender of the email from UMB Bank's Judicial Compliance department, responding regarding the subpoena.

connections.description: The bank specialist is communicating about a legal subpoena issued for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Subpoena response communication
events.description: A UMB Bank Judicial Compliance specialist sends an email regarding their response to a subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell as of June 2020.
UMB Bank's Judicial Compliance department was involved in responding to this subpoena.
The communication highlights ongoing legal process activity related to Maxwell's case during this period.
